Articles.Content:
Hello there. I am making this challenge for anyone who is waiting for a campaign in KSP.

This campaign has 2 ways of playing. The first way is missions, EXAMPLE: Build a rocket to launch the satellite into kerbin orbit, the orbit has to be at 100,000m to 150,000m for it to work rite. stuff like that...ORRR it could just be an objective type, EXAMPLE: Launch a unmanned satellite into orbit for $10,000 and then a new objective

Mission 1: Launch an Satellite into kerbin orbit at 80,000m. Gain $50,000 from a Telecommunications company

Mission 2: Send 1 astronaut into orbit for 10 Revolutions and then splash down. Gain $100,000 from hopeful investors.

Mission 3: Send 3 more communication satellites at an orbit of 100,000 for a communications and TV usage. GAIN $150,000

Mission 4: (PART I) Send 1 communication satellite at an orbit of 5,000,000m to prepare for the next Part. Gain $75,000

(PART II)Send 1 communication satellite into a munur orbit. to prepare for a munar landing GAIN $100,000

Mission 5: Send 3 lucky astronauts to the MUN. GAIN $500,000

Mission 6: Land a Rover and a communications base on the Mun and EXPLORE. GAIN $200,000 from SCIENTIST.

Mission 7: Send a recovery mission and gather rock supplies at the Mun Base (PRETEND TO GET SAMPLES) and return to kerbin. GAIN $200,000 from SCIENTIST.

Mission 8: Send a communications satellite to Minimus. Gain $500,000 from Happy investors

Mission 9: Land on Minimus and return Gain $1,000,000 once you pass this mission post your amount of money you have left RULES:

1. For every Kerbarls Death you lose $7,500 :\'(,

2. For every failed attempt at completing a mission you lose $20,000 :\'(.

3. :)THE GOOD NEWS , You start off with $250,000 to make ships.

4.The cost of the ships in game money is also deducted.

5. Last but not least you get 2 Trys at successfully completing a mission before losing $20,000 per fail

P.S if you use mods post them with your score so people can look them up.
